ossc.notes: The source was taken from http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/myfaces/source/myfaces-core-assembly-2.2.8-src.zip The guice-1.0.jar is downloaded as part of the following: http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/myfaces/binaries/myfaces-core-assembly-2.2.8-bin.zip however it is taken from the listed mvn repository by the myfaces build.
